version_description:
Thanks for using Weight Watchers! We've made some updates and bug fixes to give you the best experience possible. As new features become available, we'll be sure to highlight them here.

We've heard your feedback and we're working hard to make the improvements you've requested. In this release, we've added Touch ID support to simplify login.

We’ve made some updates and bug fixes to give you the best experience possible:

• New My Day Connect card showing hashtags for even more daily inspiration
• Favorites list and search issues fixed!
• Bug that limited the number of Journey messages fixed!

We’ve made some updates and fixed these bugs to give you the best experience possible.
• Fixed: Recipe Builder
• Fixed: Customizing recipes
• Fixed: Updating meals

Also, look out for NEW features in Connect and My Day. Threaded comments, double tap “Like,” and more are headed your way!

We’ve made some updates and bug fixes to give you the best experience possible.
• Videos under 10 seconds with no sound play automatically in your Connect feed!
• Fixed issues with video uploads, comment replies, and sharing Journey badges
• Fixed issues with tracking foods and recipes

Can't avoid those summer bugs? We've zapped ours so that you can:
• More easily access your Favorite foods (for real!)
• Quick Add foods to the right day (we'll keep up with you!)
• Update the meals you create (feel free to improvise!)

Can't avoid those summer bugs? We've zapped ours so that you can:
• More easily access your Favorite foods (for real!)
• Quick Add foods to the right day (we'll keep up with you!)
• Update the meals you create (feel free to improvise!)

Consider us de-bugged:
• Our international trackers are ready to search and tally your food choices.
• Members following Simply Filling can search and track more accurately.
• Plus, your Connect profile photo will show up in the navigation bar as your icon. Looking good!

Consider us de-bugged:
• We're all about progress, not perfection. That's why we've made posting your Progress Photos on Connect easier than ever. Here's to transformation, every day!

Consider us de-bugged:
• We're all about progress, not perfection. That's why we've made posting your Progress Photos on Connect easier than ever. Here's to transformation, every day!

WEIGHT WATCHERS IS NOW WW

After decades of helping people lose weight, we’ve become experts at inspiring healthy habits—the small acts of purpose that lead to bigger shifts. Now it’s time for us to apply this behavior change expertise to much more than weight, so we’re moving beyond weight into wellness. This update is the first of many toward inspiring wellness for everyone.

WELLNESSWINS - OUR NEW WELLNESS REWARDS PROGRAM

Success isn’t just about a number on the scale; it’s about building habits that bring you a happy, healthy life.

So we’re rewarding those habits by giving you Wins for the small, everyday steps you take to reach your goals.

Use the WW app to track your weight (no matter which way it goes) and you automatically earn Wins. Track your meals (whether it is a burger or a salad), and you earn Wins. When you rack up enough Wins, you can redeem them for real-life rewards, delivered to your door. For free. It’s that easy!

WEIGHT WATCHERS IS NOW WW

After decades of helping people lose weight, we’ve become experts at inspiring healthy habits—the small acts of purpose that lead to bigger shifts. Now it’s time for us to apply this behavior change expertise to much more than weight, so we’re moving beyond weight into wellness. This update is the first of many toward inspiring wellness for everyone.

WELLNESSWINS - OUR NEW WELLNESS REWARDS PROGRAM

Success isn’t just about a number on the scale; it’s about building habits that bring you a happy, healthy life.

So we’re rewarding those habits by giving you Wins for the small, everyday steps you take to reach your goals.

Use the WW app to track your weight (no matter which way it goes) and you automatically earn Wins. Track your meals (whether it is a burger or a salad), and you earn Wins. When you rack up enough Wins, you can redeem them for real-life rewards, delivered to your door. For free. It’s that easy!

We hope you're enjoying WW's new look and earning those "Wins"! We've been working hard on delivering an even better experience on WW:

• Fixed bug in Healthy Eating Zone so now it displays properly
• Fixed bug in search so you can keep tracking... and Winning!

We hope you're enjoying WW's new look and earning those "Wins"! We've been working hard on delivering an even better experience on WW:

• Fixed bug in Healthy Eating Zone so now it displays properly
• Fixed bug in search so you can keep tracking... and Winning!

We've debugged and improved your app experience, worked on issues that caused crashes, and finetuned a handful of things behind the scenes, all to empower your WW journey and help you build habits for a happy, healthy life.

Learning healthy habits can be a journey, but our app has your back. Whether it's our recipe collection, food tracker, Connect social network, or rewards program, we are there to support you every step of the way. With this release, we launched a new condensed Resources bar on your Profile.

Now you can easily find a WW Coach to chat with 24/7 or a Studio near you, invite a friend along on your WW journey so you both can get one month free, or quickly pull up your Monthly Pass Card at your Wellness Check-In. Better yet, get to your Connect posts even quicker with less scrolling!

We've been quietly working on behind the scenes improvements so you have the best experience possible on the app. There won't be anything new that you can see just yet... but look for exciting improvements coming very soon to your Profile. We're also cooking up something for My Day - zero points, of course!

We've debugged and improved your app experience, worked on issues that caused crashes, and finetuned a handful of things behind the scenes, all to empower your WW journey and help you build habits for a happy, healthy life.

More improvements and bug fixes are coming your way:
- You’re doing great work on your journey and we want to showcase YOU more. Now you can add a longer bio and *drum roll please* emojis to your profile. So go on, express yourself!
-We also fixed:
- Filters that were cut off, so you can keep posting amazing photos!
- Glitchy scrolling during search
- A bug that cut off food names on list of crowdsourced Member Foods

We've been working hard on delivering an even better experience on WW so you can better connect to yourself and the community:
• Connect bug fixes - enjoy a smoother posting flow.
• Your Scanned Foods list will now be in alphabetical order.

We made it possible for you to make your bio even longer and add emojis with our last release. You'll see a reminder on your profile to update your bio now and share who you are with your Connect community! Plus, keep an eye on My Day as you scroll through to track. You'll start noticing a gallery of trending posts from fellow members on Connect!

We made it possible for you to make your bio even longer and add emojis with our last release. You'll see a reminder on your profile to update your bio now and share who you are with your Connect community! Plus, keep an eye on My Day as you scroll through to track. You'll start noticing a gallery of trending posts from fellow members on Connect!

Want to find WW members you relate to? Now in Connect Groups, you can! Find people like you by joining a group. We have groups for WW members who are vegetarians, newbies, college students, new parents, and more. Now you can get the support you need on your journey together.

We also made it possible for you to express yourself in Connect through a longer bio and emojis. You’ll see a reminder on your profile to update your tagline and share who you are with your Connect community!

Want to find WW members you relate to? Now in Connect Groups, you can! Find people like you by joining a group. We have groups for WW members who are vegetarians, newbies, college students, new parents, and more. Now you can get the support you need on your journey together.

We also made it possible for you to express yourself in Connect through a longer bio and emojis. You’ll see a reminder on your profile to update your tagline and share who you are with your Connect community!

We recently launched WW Connect Groups and members are loving it. Get the support you need on your journey from people like you. We have groups for WW members who are vegetarians, newbies, college students, new parents, and more. If you haven’t joined a Group yet, tap on Connect to see what our Groups are all about.

With this release, we enhanced the Groups experience with behind-the-scenes tweaks to adding members, joining Groups, and viewing member posts.

We recently launched WW Connect Groups and members are loving it. Get the support you need on your journey from people like you. We have groups for WW members who are vegetarians, newbies, college students, new parents, and more. If you haven’t joined a Group yet, tap on Connect to see what our Groups are all about.

With this release, we enhanced the Groups experience with behind-the-scenes tweaks to adding members, joining Groups, and viewing member posts.

Announcing the arrival of Siri Shortcuts! You can now create and use quick personalized phrases to get your SmartPoints® budget, FitPoints amount, and total Wins earned, plus track yesterday’s meals so you don't miss out on any chance to redeem rewards.

Use Siri Shortcuts to keep up with your progress without opening the WW app—it even works on the Apple Watch and HomePod! Try it out by scrolling to the Siri + WW card on the bottom of My Day, or head to Settings in your WW app and tap on "Siri Shortcuts."

We've also made behind the scenes enhancements to Connect to make your WW journey even better together. Your safety and security is most important—we've now added tools so our members can better report inappropriate content in the community.

We hope you're enjoying the WW app! We've been hard at work fixing bugs and background issues, as well as making ongoing improvements. With this update, we've debuted a much-requested feature on Connect—you can now swipe left on any comment on your post, then tap the red "Delete" button to remove it.

We hope you're enjoying the WW app! We've been hard at work fixing bugs and background issues, as well as making ongoing improvements. With this update, we've debuted a much-requested feature on Connect—you can now swipe left on any comment on your post, then tap the red "Delete" button to remove it.

You’ll want to update this app fast. We heard you loud and clear:
- FIXED: The red circle notification on Journey will now go away after you check
- FIXED: Search bar will now clear after you track a food

There are also improvements on Connect! Comments on posts support and inspire you so now you can:
- Tap on a comment from notifications to go directly to that comment
- Tap on a preview of a comment in your feed and go directly to that comment

Chatting with an agent or Coach? Now you can choose to “Keep chat open” and continue your conversation with a Coach from whichever screen you’re on. You'll also see if there is anyone in front of you before you reach a WW Coach.

Enjoying the app? Please let us know by rating it or writing a review!

We've been hard at work making sure our app works best for you.
On Connect:
- The Browse Groups page now displays specific group options to follow.
- Our updated Community Guidelines are available for you to review if you need to report a post.
- Members using screen readers can now hear the number of likes and comments for the top trending posts.

We've been hard at work making sure our app works best for you.
On Connect:
- The Browse Groups page now displays specific group options to follow.
- Our updated Community Guidelines are available for you to review if you need to report a post.
- Members using screen readers can now hear the number of likes and comments for the top trending posts.

In this update, we've got improvements to Connect coming your way:

- When you tap on a comment on Connect, the feed will now direct you to that specific comment. It'll also be highlighted now for easy finding!

- Have you joined a Group on Connect yet? When you browse Groups, you'll now see categories such as Food, Activity, Identity, Journey, and more. Look around and find the best group to support and inspire your journey.

- NEW: Check out Location groups, the new category we're rolling out! Find members like you in your city or town.

In this update, we've got improvements to Connect coming your way:

- When you tap on a comment on Connect, the feed will now direct you to that specific comment. It'll also be highlighted now for easy finding!

- Have you joined a Group on Connect yet? When you browse Groups, you'll now see categories such as Food, Activity, Identity, Journey, and more. Look around and find the best group to support and inspire your journey.

- NEW: Check out Location groups, the new category we're rolling out! Find members like you in your city or town.

For this release, we've updated the Weekly Recipes gallery and your Connect Profile!

On My Day: Looking for brunch recipes or quick weeknight meals? Our Weekly Recipes gallery features all sorts of recipes that you can filter by popularity, SmartPoints value, and even prep time. Keep swiping right to get even more ideas.

On Connect: We know members inspire each other every day with photos and status updates. Now, on your profile, you can tap on the photos of the members you follow, and those who follow you, to see their profile!

For this release, we've updated the Weekly Recipes gallery and your Connect Profile!

On My Day: Looking for brunch recipes or quick weeknight meals? Our Weekly Recipes gallery features all sorts of recipes that you can filter by popularity, SmartPoints value, and even prep time. Keep swiping right to get even more ideas.

On Connect: We know members inspire each other every day with photos and status updates. Now, on your profile, you can tap on the photos of the members you follow, and those who follow you, to see their profile!

In this release we worked on zapping bugs and improving stability in the background. We resolved a few chat window issues that some members experienced when chatting with support or a Coach, so you have the best support possible on your journey.

For those excited about Location Groups in Connect, we're continuing to roll out more based on your requests. Check out Browse Groups in Connect to see the newest locations coming your way each month!

In this release we worked on zapping bugs and improving stability in the background. We resolved a few chat window issues that some members experienced when chatting with support or a Coach, so you have the best support possible on your journey.

For those excited about Location Groups in Connect, we're continuing to roll out more based on your requests. Check out Browse Groups in Connect to see the newest locations coming your way each month!

We heard you loud and clear... our members want more Groups! Along with 21 new location Groups, we launched ten new groups on Connect. Enjoy meal prepping with your Air Fryer or your Instant Pot®? Want to get inspired by Then & Now photos from other members (you have to see the medicine cabinet transformations!)? Or maybe you're looking for the best tips from others living with diabetes? We've got you covered on Connect!

We also have an exciting update for you on My Day! Once a week you will see the highly active Groups gallery on My Day. Check out Groups from the Mindset, Food, and Activity categories where the most members are sharing inspiration and tips. If you swipe all the way to the right, you can easily browse other Groups. Find the Groups (and like-minded members!) you relate to most to support your WW journey.

We're quietly working on behind-the-scenes improvements on the app, so you have all the best tools and support on your journey. We're cooking up improvements to your profile — all 0 SmartPoints® of course! We will be rolling them out over the next few months, so stay tuned.

In the meantime, check out the newest Groups on Connect. Based on our members' requests, new Location groups are being added every month!

Exciting updates with this release:
- Your Weight Chart is moving off your Journey tab to your Profile!
- The posts you make on Connect Groups will now show on your Profile to members of that group, along with your regular Connect posts (but Group posts are only visible to members in the same group).
- If you redeemed your Wins for a WellnessWins Reward, your Available Wins left to redeem will now show on top of the Journey tab instead of the Total Wins you've earned so far. That way, you'll know exactly how many Wins you have to keep redeeming, or to keep your eyes on the prize towards your next Reward!

That way, you'll know exactly how many Wins you have to keep redeeming, or to keep your eyes on the prize towards your next Reward!

We have an exciting update for this release! WW members will now see a Weight Check-in card on their My Day screen each week on their weigh-in day. This reminder can help members stay accountable on their journey and continue to see progress.

We have an exciting update for this release! WW members will now see a Weight Check-in card on their My Day screen each week on their weigh-in day. This reminder can help members stay accountable on their journey and continue to see progress.
We hear you! Our members love their Location Groups. With this update, we launched 23 new Groups in different cities. So get out there and find other WW members near you!

There are two new updates to keep your eyes on:
- We’re streamlining the app so you can find your tools even quicker. In place of the "+" button, simply tap into the “Search” bar and all your favorite tools like the Barcode Scanner, Calculator, and Quick Add, will appear... like magic!
- There's a new Connect Groups category: Events! Check out groups like WW Good and Volunteering. Because there's nothing better than doing good with like-minded members.

- There's a new Connect Groups category: Events! Check out groups like WW Good and Volunteering. Because there's nothing better than doing good with like-minded members.

For those on iOS 13.1, you get two new Siri Shortcuts! Siri can now help you search and track any food in the WW database or Quick Add the Smartpoints® value of a food not in the database. Go to Settings in the WW App and tap on Siri Shortcuts to learn more.

For those on iOS 13.1, you get two new Siri Shortcuts! Siri can now help you search and track any food in the WW database or Quick Add the Smartpoints® value of a food not in the database. Go to Settings in the WW App and tap on Siri Shortcuts to learn more.

Exciting updates!
- We know you're here for the win! Your "Journey" tab on the WW app is becoming more WellnessWins centric, giving you a one-tap way to see your Wins history.
- For those on iOS 13, the app is now compatible with Dark Mode if you have it enabled.
- For those on iOS 13.1, you get two new Siri Shortcuts! Siri can now help you search and track any food in the WW database or Quick Add the Smartpoints® value of a food not in the database. Go to Settings in the WW App and tap on Siri Shortcuts to learn more.

There are no visible updates with this version… but we are working on huge behind-the-scenes improvements and some exciting stuff! So make sure to update your WW app and stay tuned!

It's here! Experience our NEW myWW™ weight-loss program with this latest app update. For the first time ever, you get to live WW in the way that best fits your lifestyle. It’s our most customized, flexible, and innovative program yet.

It's here! Experience our NEW myWW™ weight-loss program with this latest app update. For the first time ever, you get to live WW in the way that best fits your lifestyle. It’s our most customized, flexible, and innovative program yet.

Two new updates:
- Tracking weight just got more mindful. Reflect on your focus and feelings week to week with fun emojis! You can note habits that you're keeping, challenges that you met, moments that made you proud, and your future goals. You're so much more than a number!
- We’re streamlining the app so you can find your tools even quicker. In place of the "+" button, simply tap into the "Search" bar and all your favorite tools like the Barcode Scanner, Calculator, and Quick Add will appear!

Two new updates:

- We’re streamlining the app so you can find your tools even quicker. In place of the "+" button, simply tap into the "Search" bar and all your favorite tools like the Barcode Scanner, Calculator, and Quick Add will appear!

We hope you’re enjoying the new weight tracking experience and reflecting on how your week went! There’s no such thing as too many emojis ;). Please note that this is the last release to support iOS 10. Stay tuned for more enhancements and celebrations coming your way next year!

We've debugged and improved your app experience, worked on issues that caused crashes, and finetuned a handful of things behind the scenes, all to empower your WW journey and help you build habits for a happy, healthy life.

Not sure what to eat and looking for inspiration? Soon when you type “Recipes” or “ZeroPoint foods” into the Search bar, new links will appear below it to make browsing recipes and your ZeroPoint foods list even easier.

Enjoying WellnessWins™? Check. Your rewards tab is getting a visual update to make viewing rewards and using your Wins more fun.

Also, please update to the latest iOS version to keep getting the latest updates from WW.

With this update:
- Workshop + Digital members: We are transitioning our in-person Workshops to Virtual Workshops until April 4. Yes, you can attend your Workshop from home! Stay tuned to your inbox for news, if you haven't heard already.
- Your WellnessWins™ rewards tab is getting a visual update to make viewing rewards and using your Wins more fun.

With this update:
- Workshop + Digital members: We are transitioning our in-person Workshops to Virtual Workshops until April 4. Yes, you can attend your Workshop from home! Stay tuned to your inbox for news, if you haven't heard already.
- Your WellnessWins™ rewards tab is getting a visual update to make viewing rewards and using your Wins more fun.

With this update:
- You've been asking for water tracking, and we heard you loud and clear! Members will start to see water tracking on their app home screen, with a fun water line that rises up the tracker! Tap on the ""+"" or ""-"" to track or remove water. Head to Settings to adjust your desired serving size!
- When searching for a food, members can now filter by ingredients, recipes, or dietary preferences and sort by SmartPoints (low to high or high to low).
- Workshop + Digital members: As you know, we transitioned our in-person Workshops to live Virtual Workshops. The transition will continue for the time being, so YES, you can continue to attend your Workshop from home!

- When searching for a food, members can now filter by ingredients, recipes, or dietary preferences and sort by SmartPoints (low to high or high to low).
- Workshop + Digital members: As you know, we transitioned our in-person Workshops to live Virtual Workshops. The transition will continue for the time being, so YES, you can continue to attend your Workshop from home!

With this update, you'll see a new search box in Connect Groups under each category! This way, you can find your group easily within dozens of categories like hobbies, locations, and lifestage. We're also adding new videos every week to the WW Now Connect Group! Join the WW Now group for member-exclusive videos with special guests, inspiring menus, ways to get moving, and mindful moments.

Looking for inspiration to stay active? Scroll down the WW app home screen and you'll see brand new, at-home workout videos by FitOn! There's something for everybody.

Get ready for June updates! Have you ever scrolled on Connect and wanted to "save" a post? You can tap on the bookmark icon under any Connect post to save it for later! Also, your "Favorites" section has now been renamed "Saved" on your Profile. Tap on the bookmark icon and it'll bring you to your Saved section with your saved recipes, activity, and Connect posts all in one place.

We've fine-tuned a handful of things behind the scenes for future updates coming your way! Our Personal Coaching members will now be able to see past sessions and message history with their Personal Coaches, whether the Coach is active or not.

We've fine-tuned a handful of things behind the scenes for future updates coming your way! Our Personal Coaching members will now be able to see past sessions and message history with their Personal Coaches, whether the Coach is active or not.

With this update:
- Members can connect their wearable device or app to sync their sleep data and automatically track their sleep each night. Supported devices include Apple Health, Fitbit, Garmin, Withings, and Misfit. Start syncing to see how you're doing each night!
- Enjoy your Connect Groups? Group posts will now appear on Connect to group members. To visit the group page, just tap the group name on your feed.

With this update:
- Members can connect their wearable device or app to sync their sleep data and automatically track their sleep each night. Supported devices include Apple Health, Fitbit, Garmin, Withings, and Misfit. Start syncing to see how you're doing each night!
- Enjoy your Connect Groups? Group posts will now appear on Connect to group members. To visit the group page, just tap the group name on your feed.

- Have you enjoyed filtering and sorting your search results while browsing the food database? By late July, all members will see a new filter under Dietary Preferences: Lactose-free.
- Stay hydrated and keep tracking your water intake! We've adjusted the water serving size to an 8 oz. glass.
- For those enjoying our FitOn video workouts, you can now track them for FitPoints® automatically once a workout is complete.

- For those enjoying our FitOn video workouts, you can now track them for FitPoints® automatically once a workout is complete.

We know hydration is a key to wellness! For those of you staying hydrated and tracking water, we have an update for you! By late July, custom serving sizes will be available so you can tailor your tracking to your daily routine.

Here's what's new:
-We're giving you more reactions to choose from on Connect! Hold down the heart to choose applause, a muscle flex, tears, or laughter, because we're all in this together. Tap on the number of reactions to see who responded to your post!
-Your new Sleep experience now includes a bar chart of your daily sleep stats. To see each day’s data, tap the bar or select the day of the week in the calendar.

New updates coming your way by the end of August:
- Your home screen is getting a fresh redesign with personalized carousels, so keep swiping right to see your tailored to-do's and the latest news.
- Love sharing and getting ideas from others? We see those self-made polls! Members will now be able to create Polls in their Connect Groups and feed to poll the community. Choose 1-2 photos in your poll, along with 2-3 text options!

Members spoke, and we listened. Now you can edit your username! Head to your Profile in the app, or Account Settings on WW.com to update your username.

For those waiting for Polls on Connect, we've been feverishly working on them—check back in late September!

We're cooking up exciting updates coming your way this fall and winter! In the meantime, have you checked out your homescreen's new look, reacted to a Connect post, or tried changing up your username? There's tons to explore, plus Polls on Connect are also coming soon!

For those tracking and enjoying our WW snacks and foods, we've got an update you'll love. After you track a WW product, a new card will appear to bring you right to the WW Shop. Reordering your faves is just a tap away if you're running low! How's that for convenient?

Welcome to the NEW myWW+! Lose weight with our most holistic, comprehensive program—ever. You're getting new food, activity, sleep, and mindset features, including:
-Meal planning tools and personalized recipe recommendations (Hint: Find them under "You might also like...")
-“What’s in Your Fridge?” recipe suggestions based on what you already have when you search for meals to track
-5-Minute Coaching audio sessions with mindset practices to help boost your mood
-Sleep tracking and bedtime routines (another chance to earn WellnessWins™ rewards!)
-Weekly check-in, progress report, and personalized action plan, plus see your daily stats under your food tracker, for even more motivation

Winning just got easier. We updated the WellnessWins™ section of the app to include a button that brings you directly to where you need to track.
Winning just got easier. We updated the WellnessWins™ section of the app to include a button that brings you directly to where you need to track.

When it comes to Digital 360, the more Coaches you follow, the more motivation and inspiration you’ll get! To make it easier for you to spot our amazing WW leaders (and follow more of them!), we’ve added a card at the top of the Coach Hub with suggestions.

When it comes to Digital 360, the more Coaches you follow, the more motivation and inspiration you’ll get! To make it easier for you to spot our amazing WW leaders (and follow more of them!), we’ve added a card at the top of the Coach Hub with suggestions.

We’ve got some exciting updates to make your journey easier. We added a search bar, which makes it easier than ever to find what you’re looking for in our discover tab—from articles to recipes to workouts. For Digital 360 members, we added a “see all events'' page that lets you explore everything that’s coming up, as well as an “I’m in” button that sends you a push notification before a CoachLIVE. We also expanded the capabilities of Coach profiles, so you’ll have access to more of their older content. Plus, for Digital 360 and Unlimited Workshops + Digital members, we made it easier to find your Coach’s most recent posts by moving them to the top of their group—enjoy!

We’ve got some exciting updates to make your journey easier. We added a search bar, which makes it easier than ever to find what you’re looking for in our discover tab—from articles to recipes to workouts. For Digital 360 members, we added a “see all events'' page that lets you explore everything that’s coming up, as well as an “I’m in” button that sends you a push notification before a CoachLIVE. We also expanded the capabilities of Coach profiles, so you’ll have access to more of their older content. Plus, for Digital 360 and Unlimited Workshops + Digital members, we made it easier to find your Coach’s most recent posts by moving them to the top of their group—enjoy!

If you’re a Digital 360 member, you know it’s all about the power of support—so we made it even easier to follow your Coaches. You’ll also see that we added more info to the “See All Coaches” page, so you can find everything you need to get next-level support in one place. And for all our other goal-getting members, you can now collapse the What’s In Your Fridge section while in search, which will make accessing your frequent foods a breeze. Happy tracking!

For Digital 360 members, we’ve made a little tweak that’ll be a big help: On the Coach video page, you’ll now see labels above each video that say “Quick tips” or “CoachLIVES,” so you can find what you’re looking for faster!

We know there can be a lot to remember when you’re starting a wellness journey, so to help make things a bit simpler, we moved the reminder to set a weight goal to a more prominent spot in My Day. We also updated the What’s in Your Fridge tool so the “add ingredient” button is higher up on the page and the search bar is more visible to give you the smoothest experience possible. Happy tracking!

We know there can be a lot to remember when you’re starting a wellness journey, so to help make things a bit simpler, we moved the reminder to set a weight goal to a more prominent spot in My Day. We also updated the What’s in Your Fridge tool so the “add ingredient” button is higher up on the page and the search bar is more visible to give you the smoothest experience possible. Happy tracking!

We want you to have the best app experience possible, and that’s where these enhancements come in. First, the What’s in Your Fridge tool now has more specific search capabilities. So, instead of being able to only type in “fish,” members can now specify the type (i.e.,salmon, cod, etc.) to get the most relevant recipes. We’ve also made the visuals in the app more clear and informational!

We revamped the “things to do” section in MyDay to make it more customized to you—and more fun. And now playing for Digital 360 members: An update to the CoachHub video experience! You’ll see a newly added title and description when you click into a video, so you’ll know exactly what you’re watching.

We revamped the “things to do” section in MyDay to make it more customized to you—and more fun. And now playing for Digital 360 members: An update to the CoachHub video experience! You’ll see a newly added title and description when you click into a video, so you’ll know exactly what you’re watching.

For Digital 360 members, we added a “See all CoachLIVES” button to the homepage, so you can access on-demand content even easier than before. For all our goal-crushing members, we’ve been debugging, working on issues that caused crashes, and fine-tuning some behind-the-scenes things—so you can focus on you.
